name: Verify that the system displays an error message when entering a password that does not meet minimum requirements.
Verify that the "Download" button is functional
Verify that the user is not granted access when logging in with an incorrect password.
Verify that an appropriate error message is displayed when attempting to create an account with an empty Media Outlet Name.
Verify that the form does not submit when the email field is left empty.
Verify that the 'Sign up' link navigates to the signup page.
Verify that the user is not granted access when logging in with an invalid email.
Verify that the email input field accepts valid email formats.
Verify that the system prompts the user to correct an invalid email format when submitting the form.
Verify that all form elements adjust properly on different screen sizes when resizing the browser window.
Verify that the Log In link redirects the user to the login page when clicked.
Verify that all form fields can be reached and filled using keyboard navigation without a mouse.
Verify that placeholder text in each input field is displayed correctly when the fields are empty.
Verify that password strength indicators update correctly as the user types a valid password meeting all criteria.
Verify that the user can successfully create an account by filling in all required fields with valid data.
Verify that clicking the 'Forgot password' link redirects the user to the correct password recovery page.
Verify that the 'Remember for 30 days' checkbox can be checked and unchecked.
Verify that the placeholder text in the email and password fields is visible and appropriately descriptive.
Verify that user can update their password with valid current password
Verify that the form is responsive and user-friendly when accessed from a mobile device.
Verify that a specific error message is shown when submitting the form with mismatched passwords.
Verify that the password input field accepts a variety of valid passwords.
Verify that a user can successfully log in with valid email and password.
Verify that the form does not submit when the password field is left empty.
